alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 8:32PM MST until March 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Kansas, Logan and Wallace Counties. In Colorado, Kit Carson County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
